section-what-do.title: What I Do
section-what-do.col1-body: From conepts to wireframes to pixel-perfect interfaces, I utlitize user centered design principles to create beautiful digital products that are easy to use and engaging.
section-what-do.col2-body: I have the ability to make my designs a reality in code. My focus has been on static web developement but I’m in the process of learning ios and android developement.

section1.sub-title: I’m in my 4th year at the University of Cincinnati’s  DAAP Program earning a degree in Graphic comunication design. I’m on track to graduation in spring of 2016.

section2.sub-title: I over a year of experience working in design in the San Francisco Bay Area.

job1.heading: UX INTERN | SPRING 2014
job1.body: User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

job2.heading: UX INTERN | FALL 2013, SUMMER 2014
job2.body: User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

job3.heading: DESIGN INTERN | SPRING 2013
job3.body: User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

section3.sub-title: In the past 2 years I’ve worked on 3 major projects for companies in the energy industry.

companies.heading: Chevron Corporate Website Redesign
companies.body: Chevron wanted a new platform to express their human energy brand in the context of story telling. My role was interaction design on a team with visual designers, developers and copy writers.

companies.heading: PGE&E Solar Dashboard
companies.body: Pacific Gas and Electric wanted a unique online experience so their solar customers could understand their energy bill. I led the design of this project and was responsible for all phases of the design process.

companies.heading: Genability Solar Switch
companies.body: Switch is a line of web and mobile applications that visualizes a homeowner's potential savings by installing solar panels on their roof. I worked with a small team through all phases of the design process.
